text: Charles John Thomas McCann (September 2, 1934 â€“ April 8, 2018) was an American actor and television personality. He was known for his roles in Far Out Space Nuts, DuckTales, and G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero. McCann died in Los Angeles, California of congestive heart failure on April 8, 2018 at the age of 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1934 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from congestive heart failure Category:American voice actors Category:American radio actors Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American television personalities Category:Actors from New York City
